 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּעַל‎</span><sub>57</sub> **verb** ==do, make== (in poetry for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָשָׂה‎</span>) (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּוֺעֵל‎</span> ***workman***, compare Jewish-Aramaic; Phoenician <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פעל‎</span> = Biblical Hebrew (often); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***id.***; Old Aramaic; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פעל‎</span>; Syriac in derived species and derivatives ); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular [[Deut.32.27|Deut 32:27]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָ֫עַל אֵל‎</span> [[Num.23.23|Num 23:23]], 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּעַלְתָּ‎</span> [[Exod.15.17|Exod 15:17]] +, etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִפְעַל‎</span> [[Job.22.17|Job 22:17]] +; 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּפְעָלֿ‎</span> [[Job.35.6|Job 35:6]], etc.; ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְפָעְָלָם‎</span> [[Job.37.12|Job 37:12]] (see below); ***Participle active*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֹּעֵל‎</span> [[Ps.15.2|Ps 15:2]]+, plural construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֹּעֲלֵי‎</span> [[Ps.5.6|Ps 5:6]] +, etc.; — 

**1.** ***do:*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** of God, with accusative (abstract) [[Num.23.23|Num 23:23]]; [[Deut.32.27|Deut 32:27]]; [[Job.33.29|Job 33:29]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יְשׁוּעוֺת‎</span> [[Ps.74.12|Ps 74:12]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person [[Ps.31.20|Ps 31:20]]; [[Ps.68.29|Ps 68:29]]; [[Isa.26.12|Isa 26:12]]; [[Job.22.17|Job 22:17]] with accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֹּעַל‎</span> [[Ps.44.2|Ps 44:2]]; [[Hab.1.5|Hab 1:5]] accusative omitted [[Isa.43.13|Isa 43:13]], compare [[Isa.41.4|Isa 41:4]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** of men, with accusative [[Ps.11.3|Ps 11:3]]; [[Job.11.8|Job 11:8]], + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person (God) [[Job.7.20|Job 7:20]], + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span> person (God) [[Job.35.6|Job 35:6]] especially of doing evil, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁ֑קֶר‎</span> [[Hos.7.1|Hos 7:1]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עָוֶל‎</span> [[Job.34.32|Job 34:32]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַוְלָה‎</span> [[Job.36.23|Job 36:23]]; [[Ps.58.3|Ps 58:3]]; [[Ps.119.3|Ps 119:3]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אָוֶן‎</span> [[Prov.30.20|Prov 30:20]], especially <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֹּעֲלֵי אָוֶן‎</span> [[Hos.6.8|Hos 6:8]]; [[Isa.31.2|Isa 31:2]]; [[Job.31.3|Job 31:3]]; [[Job.34.8|Job 34:8]]; [[Job.34.22|Job 34:22]]; [[Ps.5.6|Ps 5:6]] + 15 t. in Psalms, [[Prov.10.29|Prov 10:29]]; [[Prov.21.15|Prov 21:15]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֹּעֲלֵי רָע‎</span> [[Mic.2.1|Mic 2:1]] rarely of doing right, with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִשְׁפָּטוֺ‎</span> [[Zeph.2.3|Zeph 2:3]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צֶדֶק‎</span> [[Ps.15.2|Ps 15:2]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** of clouds, with accusative [[Job.37.12|Job 37:12]] (disregarding <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎֑֯‎</span>). 

**2.** ***make***; 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** of God, with accusative concrete [[Exod.15.17|Exod 15:17]] + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> of thing [[Prov.16.4|Prov 16:4]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> of 2nd object [[Ps.7.16|Ps 7:16]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֹּעֲלִי‎</span> [[Job.36.3|Job 36:3]] ***my Maker.*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** of man, with accusative concrete [[Isa.44.12|Isa 44:12]]; [[Isa.44.15|Isa 44:15]] accusative omitted [[Isa.44.12|Isa 44:12]]; [[Ps.7.16|Ps 7:16]]. — [[Isa.1.31|Isa 1:31]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פֹּעַל‎</span>.
